backend/main.mo: Actor managing access control, user approvals, invite-only mode, and user profiles with authorization checks and profile storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend files and components.
frontend/docs/v48-modecard-resume-button: Documentation explaining the UI-only change that moves the Resume Game button below Start New Game in ModeCard.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining theme variables, dark mode values, and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading the root React element and main.tsx script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup configuring all app routes, error boundaries, layout, and the AuthGate wrapper.
frontend/src/components/accepting-gifts/: Component rendering a table of Accepting Gifts win/loss stats by ball count with fallback when no data exists.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaBallButto: Renders a circular APA ball button with state-based styling and ARIA labeling. Triggers clicks and optionally disables interaction.
frontend/src/components/apa/apaBallStyle: Defines ball state types and helpers for ball labels and values, plus rack total calculation including one-away 9-ball adjustments. Ensures rack accounting stays consistent at 10 points.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaRackScori: Manages rack scoring logic including ball states, innings, defensive shots, auto-dead rules, and live scoring updates. Integrates inning flow and match context to compute rack totals.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaResultsSu: Displays final match results with winner info, match points, and detailed player statistics. Uses badges and icons to show skill level, points, innings, and PPI.
frontend/src/components/apa/RealApaMatch: Form for creating or editing logged APA matches with validation, connection handling, and save/update mutations. Manages fields for scores, innings, defensive shots, and player skill levels.
frontend/src/components/apa/useApaInning: Hook managing inning flow, tracking active player, shared innings, and ball activity. Provides methods to mark shots, switch turns, reset racks, and compute final innings.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Protects routes by enforcing login, approval, admin, and invite-only access rules. Shows loading, login prompt, or access-denied views as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with fallback handling for already-authenticated errors. Clears query cache on logout and updates UI state.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for creating or editing a user profile, handling form state, backend readiness, and save logic.
frontend/src/components/history/MatchHis: Renders a match history table with derived APA stats, match details, and navigation to individual match pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, navigation buttons, connection status, profile setup, and routed content.
frontend/src/components/matches/DeleteMa: Provides a confirmation dialog and mutation logic to delete a match and redirect or trigger a callback.
frontend/src/components/matches/EndMatch: Reusable confirmation dialog for ending a match with customizable text and pending state handling.
frontend/src/components/matches/MatchSum: Displays a summary card for a match including mode, date, score, outcome, and navigation to details.
frontend/src/components/navigation/ModeC: Card UI for selecting a game mode with start and optional resume actions based on session state.
frontend/src/components/players/ApaAggre: Renders PPI and match result trend charts for APA data, computing sorted datapoints and best-10 averages.
frontend/src/components/straight-shot/St: Builds a histogram of straight-shot counts by frequency and displays it in a bar chart.
Shows a table summarizing wins, losses, and first win dates grouped by ball count.
Displays a composed chart of straight-shot counts over time along with an average value.
frontend/src/dev/straight-shot-spot-chec: Manual QA checklist ensuring Straight Shot flow, win/loss logic, data persistence, and UI remain correct.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity changes, invalidating related react-query caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorRetry.ts: Provides a helper to clear and refetch the actor query for reconnection attempts.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for fetching and mutating matches, profiles, and approval data using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables for light/dark mode, defining UI color tokens and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/accepting-gifts/accepti: Implements state updates for the Accepting Gifts drill, including ball count clamping, attempt scoring, and advancing to the next set.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaAggregateStats.t: Extracts APA match datapoints, computes PPI/aPPI, official outcomes, and calculates averages such as best‑10‑of‑20 and win rate.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaEqualizer.ts: Provides APA skill levels, points‑to‑win mappings, and helpers for validating and formatting skill levels and targets.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaMatchPoints.ts: Defines the APA match‑point chart and threshold ranges used to convert loser SL and points into 20‑point outcomes.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaPracticeMatchOut: Computes APA practice match outcomes using player targets, loser SL, and the match‑point chart.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaScoring.ts: Implements APA rack scoring, PPI calculation, rack validation, and aggregation of per‑player rack stats.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaSkillLevelPredic: Predicts APA skill level based on PPI or aPPI using predefined numeric ranges.
Determines official APA win/loss/unknown outcomes based on skill levels, scores, and optional didWin flags.
frontend/src/lib/apa/officialApaPpi.ts: Parses text inputs and computes official APA PPI/aPPI values with validation and formatting helpers.
frontend/src/lib/history/matchHistoryRow: Builds human‑readable match history summary strings for all match modes based on stored match data.
frontend/src/lib/matches/effectiveMatchD: Parses match date strings safely and computes a consistent timestamp for sorting and formatting official APA matches.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuilders.t: Builds official APA match log records, deriving outcomes and generating match IDs, and re-exports other match builders.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuildersOr: Provides builders for APA Nine Ball, Accepting Gifts, and other match types, constructing full MatchLogRecord structures.
frontend/src/lib/session/inProgressSessi: Manages in-progress session state in sessionStorage with helpers to check, clear, and list active game modes.
frontend/src/lib/stats/acceptingGiftsPer: Computes Accepting Gifts win/loss performance grouped by starting ball count levels 2–7.
frontend/src/lib/stats/acceptingGiftsSta: Calculates summary stats for Accepting Gifts sessions, including totals and rolling average of ending ball counts.
Aggregates official APA stats including win rate, total matches, and average PPI/APPI values.
frontend/src/lib/stats/straightShotStats: Computes Straight Shot statistics such as averages, lowest shots, trend data, histograms, and win/loss summaries.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/accepting-gifts/Accep: Loads and manages an Accepting Gifts drill session, handling attempts, set progression, session persistence, and match completion.
Displays the rules, setup, scoring, and tips for the Accepting Gifts drill.
Start page for a new Accepting Gifts session with player info, notes, rules, ball count, and resume/start handling.
Manages APA practice match state, scoring, rack input, session persistence, and match completion logic.
frontend/src/pages/apa/PracticeStartPage: Start page for APA practice matches, handling player names, skill levels, validation, and in‑progress session prompts.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchEditP: Loads an APA match by ID, redirects if missing, and renders a prefilled edit form for official match log data.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchPlace: Displays a page for creating a new official APA match log using the RealApaMatchForm in create mode.
frontend/src/pages/auth/AccessNotAllowed: Shows an invite‑only access notice and allows users to request approval, displaying confirmation once submitted.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchDetailsP: Fetches and displays detailed match data, including APA‑specific stats, with navigation to related views.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchHistoryP: Lists all matches with sorting, filtering, and card/table views, supporting APA, gifts, and straight match modes.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page with navigation cards for all game modes and a link to match history when authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerApprovalsP: Provides an admin interface to manage user approvals and invite‑only mode, including approving, rejecting, and bulk actions.
frontend/src/pages/players/PlayerAggrega: Displays aggregated APA stats for a specific player, including charts, win rates, and predicted skill levels.
frontend/src/pages/SmokeCheckPage.tsx: A simple deployment verification page with a checklist and navigation buttons to Home and Match History.
frontend/src/pages/stats/StatsPage.tsx: Renders the main stats dashboard, loading match data and computing APA, Straight Shot, and Accepting Gifts statistics with navigation to related views.
frontend/src/pages/straight-shot/Straigh: Manages an active Straight Shot session, persisting state, handling input, and saving the match through backend actors.
Displays the rules and instructions for the Straight Shot drill in a styled card.
Provides a start screen for new Straight Shot sessions, showing moving averages and handling in‑progress session logic.
frontend/src/utils/errorText.ts: Converts unknown error values into readable text, handling nested error objects and fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/playerName.ts: Provides helper functions for normalizing and comparing player names case-insensitively.
frontend/src/utils/playerRoutes.ts: Builds the URL path for a player's aggregate stats page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout that rejects if the operation exceeds a specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining themes, colors, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Tracks current release scope, architectural rules for drill and APA 9-ball logic, and a list of active bugs across scoring, UI, login, and persistence systems.
